title: The life, apprehensio[n,] arraignement, and execution of Char[les] Covrtney, alias Hollice, alias Worsley, and Clement Slie fencer with their escapes and breaking of prison: As also the true and hearty repentance of Charles Courtney w[ith] other passages, worthy the note and reading.
author: Courtney, Charles, d. 1612.
publisher: Printed [by W. Hall] for Edward Marchant, and are to bee sold in Pau[ls] Churceyard [sic] ouer against the Crosse,
notes: Woodcut of Courtney's prison break and execution on title page.
Imperfect; title page trimmed affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
